details.title: The Approximate Transient Performance of a Phase-Locked Loop on Board a Tumbling Satellite
details.abstract: The transient performance of a phase-locked loop on board a tumbling satellite is discussed. The probability of maintaining the in-ock condition during the tumbling mode as a function of time is presented in graphical form as a function of the following parameters: signal-to-noise ratio, the fade modulation factor, and the loop bandwidth.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
